Text.val: 27.06.2011 GB SCR15413 Changed the part d. Add row(s) in DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODE
08.04.2011 SH SCR16315 Added test to update DEBH fields only if the related
11.03.2011 GB SCR16290 Extend the call of BDH006 with PI.LEGALOWNER
28.02.2010 GB SCR15413 Reconstruction of the task
01.07.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
28.05.2010 GB SCR15413 Changed condition for call Part 1 and Part2

ExpSyntax.val: 'ST number already exists for another debtor'

Header.Description: b. ST number does not exist

FormName.valUnicode: b. ST number does not exist

ExpSyntax.val: 'SN number already exists for another legal owner'
'ST number already exists for another debtor'

Header.Description: d. ST number does not exist

FormName.valUnicode: d. ST number does not exist

Text.val: -- For every selected row call BDC005DH to change the old debtor ING ComFin nr
-- Store a row in table DEBTOR_HELLER_DUPLICATE
-- Start BDH020 to perform the bookings with parameter DHDU_NO
-- Report probable affilite which must be connected to the new owner

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO and b.DEBC_DATDELETED is null)) group by a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- If this row exists and DHIC_ID <> T203_COMPANY_REG_NR
-- Report probable affilite which must be connected to the new owner
-- 2. Test for every client if the legal owner already exists

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b, :1/DEBH DEBH where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO)) group by a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- If this row exists and DHIC_ID <> T203_COMPANY_REG_NR
